thread.title: NYC trial revisits infamous heist portrayed in 'Goodfellas'
thread.title_full: NYC trial revisits infamous heist portrayed in 'Goodfellas'

title: NYC trial revisits infamous heist portrayed in 'Goodfellas'
text: > Entertainment NYC trial revisits infamous heist portrayed in 'Goodfellas' In this April, 1979 file photo, James "Jimmy the Gent" Burke is led handcuffed from a law enforcement vehicle in New York. Burke is believed to have masterminded and executed the 1978 Lufthansa heist. Vincent Asaro, a mob associate of Burke's, will go to trail in October, 2015 for his part in the $6 million armed robbery at Kennedy Airport. The 1978 heist that was one of the largest cash robberies in U.S. history, was immortalized in the Martin Scorsese mob movie "Goodfellas." (AP Photo/File)
